column1: '''Ramdal''' was a cluster of low hills in [[East Beleriand]]
column2: some miles to the west of [[Amon Ereb]]. They marked the eastern extent of the [[Andram]]
column4: that ran eastward for many leagues from the hills around [[Nargothrond]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>

column2: consisting of ''[[ram]]'' ("wall") + ''[[tal|dal]]'' ("end").<ref>{{S|Beleriand}}</ref><ref>{{S|Appendix}}</ref><ref>[http://www.tolkiendil.com/langues/english/i-lam_arth/compound_sindarin_names#r Compound Sindarin Names in Middle-earth] at [http://www.tolkiendil.com/ Tolkiendil.com] (accessed 27 June 2011)</ref>
